sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { trigger, transition, style, animate } from '@angular/animations'; @Component({ selector: 'app-homes', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'], animations: [ trigger('fadeInOut', [ transition(':enter', [ style({ opacity: 0 }), animate('600ms', style({ opacity: 1 })), ]), transition(':leave', [animate('600ms', style({ opacity: 0 }))]), ]), ], }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { constructor() {} ngOnInit() {} }

Exposición 2023

  • Salud
  • Industria
  • Cultivo
  • Cultura

3, 4 y 5 de noviembre 2023

La Rural
